def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def shipCode = parse.commonParameters.shipCode log.info shipCode assert shipCode == "RD"
def sailDate = parse.commonParameters.sailDate log.info sailDate assert sailDate == 20240621
def packageCode = parse.commonParameters.packageCode log.info packageCode assert packageCode == "RD13BL07"
def categoryBestPrice = parse.categoryBestPrice[0] log.info categoryBestPrice assert categoryBestPrice != null
